title: Our Belmont Wastewater Treatment Plant | Citizens Energy Group
cleaned_text: Belmont Plant Project Description The facility improvements at the Belmont AWTP expand treatment capacity to 300 MGD and maintain compliance with the current National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permit. Project Stats - Projects completed in 2012 - Plant improvements include: - Wet-weather storage basins (30 and 4 million gallons) - Two new primary clarifiers and new process yard piping - Installation of gravity belt thickeners - New wet-weather treatment including new aeration tanks - New wet-weather disinfection system - Significantly reduces the combined sewer overflow at outfall 008 - Eliminates AWTP primary effluent discharge - Peak treatment rate of 300 million gallons per day
